properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT STUDY_TIME_NO, TARGET_TIME, TIME_AMOUNT, STUDY_DATE FROM STUDY_TIME WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY STUDY_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 10
INSERT INTO STUDY_TIME (STUDY_TIME_NO, USER_NO, TIME_AMOUNT, TARGET_TIME) VALUES(SEQ_STNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? )
SELECT SUM (TIME_AMOUNT) AS TIME_AMOUNT FROM STUDY_TIME WHERE USER_NO = ?
